### In today's edition, discover your emotional intelligence and leadership strengths with my free assessment.

Ever wonder how your leadership style affects your team and organization? Want to uncover areas where you can grow and improve?

I've got a gift for you - **a free Leadership Assessment that will shed light on your emotional intelligence and leadership strengths**. This confidential tool will help you:

* Get a better grasp of your leadership style
* Pinpoint areas for growth and development
* Boost your self-awareness and emotional intelligence

Take the first step in unlocking your leadership potential.

[Take the assessment](https://substack.com/redirect/7fd247e0-f6f2-4e35-8962-8b1dd8d0c2a8?j=eyJ1Ijoibm10MnYifQ.NjEarT2ZIO18IdxC9k5a0j0BJcwjvF6cgtuRD-MCySI)

Keep striving for excellence,

Lewis C. Lin
